colorblindcheck 0.1.0

    • Checking rcartocolor for colorblind friendly palettes
    • colorblindcheck: Check Color Palettes for Problems with Color Vision Deficiency

    Checking rcartocolor for colorblind friendly palettes

    Jakub Nowosad

    2019-04-28

    check_rcartocolor.Rmd
    library(colorblindcheck)
library(rcartocolor)

    Quantitative

    Colorblind friendly palettes

    display_carto_all(type = "quantitative")

    TealGrn

    TealGrn = carto_pal(7, "TealGrn")
colorblindcheck::palette_check(TealGrn, plot = TRUE)

    #>           name n tolerance ncp ndcp min_dist mean_dist max_dist
#> 1       normal 7  4.525989  21   21 4.525989  20.41736 43.86276
#> 2 deuteranopia 7  4.525989  21   20 4.398525  23.08789 48.81635
#> 3   protanopia 7  4.525989  21   19 3.226824  21.30028 45.50978
#> 4   tritanopia 7  4.525989  21   19 3.791497  13.89019 30.43883

    Teal

    Teal = carto_pal(7, "Teal")
colorblindcheck::palette_check(Teal, plot = TRUE)

    #>           name n tolerance ncp ndcp min_dist mean_dist max_dist
#> 1       normal 7  6.862176  21   21 6.862176  23.00297 50.28819

    Diverging

    display_carto_all(type = "diverging")

    Colorblind friendly palettes

    Earth

    Tropic = carto_pal(7, "Earth")

    Qualitative

    display_carto_all(type = "qualitative")

    Aggregation

    display_carto_all(type = "aggregation")
